verses.text: Hear \w this|strong="H1121"\w*, you peoples all; attend, all you \w who|strong="H1121"\w* live \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* world

\w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* low degree \w and|strong="H5971"\w* high, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rich \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* poor \w together|strong="H8085"\w*.
\w My|strong="H1571"\w* mouth \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* utter wisdom, \w the|strong="H1571"\w* thoughts \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* seeing heart.

\w I|strong="H3820"\w* incline \w my|strong="H1696"\w* ear \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* proverb, \w on|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* lyre \w I|strong="H3820"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* open \w my|strong="H1696"\w* riddle.
Why should I be afraid \w in|strong="H5186"\w* \w the|strong="H5186"\w* days \w of|strong="H4912"\w* misfortune, when circled by wicked \w and|strong="H3658"\w* cunning foes,

\w who|strong="H4100"\w* put \w their|strong="H3117"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3117"\w* wealth, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* boast \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3117"\w* boundless riches?

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* assuredly no one can ransom \w themselves|strong="H5921"\w*, or \w give|strong="H1984"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God \w the|strong="H5921"\w* price \w of|strong="H7230"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* life,

\w for|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w ransom|strong="H3724"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* life \w is|strong="H3808"\w* costly, \w no|strong="H3808"\w* payment \w is|strong="H3808"\w* \w ever|strong="H3808"\w* enough,

\w to|strong="H5315"\w* keep them \w alive|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H5315"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, so \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w never|strong="H5769"\w* \w to|strong="H5315"\w* see \w the|strong="H5769"\w* pit \w at|strong="H5315"\w* \w all|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w*. \w Even|strong="H5750"\w* wise \w people|strong="H3808"\w* die, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* fool \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* brutish perish alike, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* abandon \w their|strong="H7200"\w* \w wealth|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* others.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* grave \w is|strong="H3684"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* everlasting home, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* place \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H2450"\w* live \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever \w and|strong="H7200"\w* ever, \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* own names \w they|strong="H3588"\w* called whole lands.
\w Despite|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* wealth, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* perish \w like|strong="H1004"\w* dumb animals.

\w This|strong="H3885"\w* is \w the|strong="H3885"\w* fate of \w the|strong="H3885"\w* confident fool, \w and|strong="H3366"\w* \w the|strong="H3885"\w* end of those who \w are|strong="H1077"\w* pleased with their portion. \qs Selah\qs*

\w Like|strong="H1870"\w* sheep \w they|strong="H6310"\w* descend \w to|strong="H1870"\w* Sheol \w with|strong="H6310"\w* Death \w for|strong="H2088"\w* \w their|strong="H1870"\w* shepherd; \w down|strong="H1870"\w* \w they|strong="H6310"\w* \w go|strong="H6310"\w* straight \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* grave, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w their|strong="H1870"\w* form wastes \w away|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w their|strong="H1870"\w* home below.

But God \w will|strong="H3477"\w* assuredly ransom \w my|strong="H7462"\w* life \w from|strong="H3477"\w* \w the|strong="H7462"\w* hand \w of|strong="H4194"\w* \w Sheol|strong="H7585"\w*; \w for|strong="H6629"\w* \w he|strong="H1242"\w* \w will|strong="H3477"\w* receive me. \qs Selah\qs*

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* afraid \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w someone|strong="H5315"\w* grows rich, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* wealth \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* house increases.

\w Not|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* shred \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* all \w can|strong="H1004"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w take|strong="H7235"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* die, \w wealth|strong="H3519"\w* cannot follow \w them|strong="H3588"\w* \w down|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Though|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* count themselves happy, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H4194"\w* alive, \w and|strong="H3381"\w* win \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* \w many|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* faring \w so|strong="H3947"\w* well,
\w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H5315"\w* join \w their|strong="H3588"\w* ancestors, \w who|strong="H5315"\w* see \w the|strong="H3588"\w* light nevermore.
\w The|strong="H7200"\w* wealthy \w are|strong="H3808"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* understanding, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* perish \w like|strong="H3808"\w* dumb animals.
